thread.title: Rockstar Games not impressed with BBC drama
thread.title_full: Rockstar Games not impressed with BBC drama

title: Rockstar Games not impressed with BBC drama
text:
It's really not impressed with the BBC drama as theses tweets show. Image caption The Tweets from Rockstar with the offending word taken out Image caption This is Basil Brush if you didn't get the reference in the above tweet. 
Others with connections to Rockstar tweeted throughout the show. 
Mike Daily now works for Yoyo Games and was a creator behind Grand Theft Auto. 
The film stars Daniel Radcliffe as Sam Houser, the Briton behind the hit computer game series. 
Mike also tweeted about his appearance in the show. 
Newsbeat spoke to the BBC publicity department and were told they "won't be releasing a comment or statement on this". 
Follow @BBCNewsbeat on Twitter, BBCNewsbeat on Instagram, Radio1Newsbeat on YouTube and you can now follow BBC_Newsbeat on Snapchat Related Topics
